data.text: @chedancer @Covid19Critical Stilly disagree! My friend got Covid, suffered a swollen brain stem 2+yrs, got all 3 shots, GOT WORSE! please be careful about your tweet!
@Covid19Critical I am looking for a long haul covid victim that suffered a swollen brain stem. My friend is suffering. TYIA
@Covid19Critical What are your thoughts on low dose naltrexone?
@Covid19Critical If vaccine works, COVID-19 is over. Ignore the big liar (or murder accomplices) who recommend uselessness. Let's spread the facts and support FLCCC.

@chedancer @Covid19Critical TF?

The exact opposite is true. https://t.co/ZXHbEo06bK

@Covid19Critical Long Haul Covid sounds like Fibromyalgia & Chronic Fatigue syndrome to me

Many people already suffer from this including myself as a result of prior illness & stress

Now suddenly because it’s Covid people care!

Go get tested for Fibromyalgia & toughen up!!

@Covid19Critical Most helpful is to be vaccinated before getting covid.  Additionally, if you’re unvaccinated and get long haul covid, there is much anecdotal evidence that getting vaccinated helps alleviate some of the long haul symptoms. It’s being studied formally at Yale.
